Episodes.Title: Hey, Look Me Over
Episodes.Writer: Alan Alda, Karen Hall, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: The nurses return from evacuation to find that the doctors have left the camp a mess. Potter announces an inspection in two days, so Margaret and the nurses try to get everything reorganized. Nurse Kelly is mad at Hawkeye for igno...

Episodes.Title: Trick or Treatment
Episodes.Writer: Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: The 4077th's Halloween celebrations are interrupted by the arrival of wounded, including one supposedly dead soldier who is actually comatose and clinging to life.

Episodes.Title: Foreign Affairs
Episodes.Writer: David Pollock, Elias Davis, Karen Hall
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Charles falls in love with a French Red Cross woman but realizes that their lifestyles are not compatible. Hawkeye and BJ are helping with an army PR stunt in their own way.

Episodes.Title: The Joker Is Wild
Episodes.Writer: John Rappaport, Dennis Koenig, Karen Hall
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: It's another M*A*S*H prankathon. This time, Hawkeye appears to be the marked man after menial practical jokes happen to everyone in camp, but him. Will they get him too? Or is Hawkeye already the victim of an even larger practical...

Episodes.Title: Who Knew?
Episodes.Writer: Elias Davis, David Pollock, Karen Hall
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: When a nurse that Hawkeye is dating dies, he offers to deliver her eulogy and discovers that he didn't know her. Klinger tries to interest Charles in a business venture.

Episodes.Title: Bombshells
Episodes.Writer: Dan Wilcox, Thad Mumford, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: The whole 4077 are looking forward to a visit from Marilyn Monroe after a rumor starts; while B.J.'s fishing trip doesn't go as planned.

Episodes.Title: Settling Debts
Episodes.Writer: Thad Mumford, Dan Wilcox, Karen Hall
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Hawkeye receives a letter from Colonel Potters wife where she informs that she has paid the last mortgage on their home and asks Hawkeye and friends to throw a small surprise party for Potter to celebrate.

Episodes.Title: The Moon Is Not Blue
Episodes.Writer: Larry Balmagia, Karen Hall, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Bored at the terrible film selection, Hawkeye and BJ try to get a copy of the notorious film, "The Moon is Blue." Wounded General Rothaker declares prohibition in camp.

Episodes.Title: Run for the Money
Episodes.Writer: Elias Davis, David Pollock, Mike Farrell
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Father Mulcahy must save the camp's honor in a high-stakes footrace against the 8063rd. Hawkeye, BJ, and Margaret each bet on it. Meanwhile, Charles tries to help Private Walter Palmer, a patient who suffers frequent verbal abuse ...

Episodes.Title: U.N., the Night and the Music
Episodes.Writer: Elias Davis, David Pollock, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Three U.N. delegates come to the 4077th and make a lasting impression on members of the camp, while B.J. treats a patient whose leg injury may require an amputation.

Episodes.Title: Strange Bedfellows
Episodes.Writer: Karen Hall, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Col. Potter discovers that his son-in-law has had an affair. Meanwhile, Charles' snoring is keeping his tent-mates from getting a good night's sleep.

Episodes.Title: Say No More
Episodes.Writer: John Rappaport, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: General Addison Collins visits his wounded son Curtis, a lieutenant. Charles tries to help Margaret, who develops laryngitis as she is about to meet her hero, Dr. Steven Chesler.

Episodes.Title: Friends and Enemies
Episodes.Writer: Karen Hall, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Colonel Potter must decide whether to blow the whistle on an old army chum, Woody Cooke, whose military mistakes are costing human lives. BJ suffers from both an ingrown toenail and from Charles' insistence on playing his Mahler r...

Episodes.Title: Give and Take
Episodes.Writer: Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart, Karen Hall
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Wounded Private Kurland learns a painful lesson from the enemy soldier he's critically wounded, while the thankless job of charity collection officer passes from one staff member to another.

Episodes.Title: As Time Goes By
Episodes.Writer: Dan Wilcox, Thad Mumford, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Margaret seeks contributions for a time capsule.

Episodes.Title: Goodbye, Farewell and Amen
Episodes.Writer: Alan Alda, Burt Metcalfe, John Rappaport
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: In the closing days of the Korean War, the staff of the 4077 M*A*S*H Unit find themselves facing irrevocable changes in their lives.
